title: Each episode's ratings (raw)
description:
Description
Ratings for all episodes across all 10 GBBO series.
reference:
All official episode viewer number are from BARB, as entered on
Wikipedia https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Great_British_Bake_Off

parameters.bbc_iplayer_requests:
number of BBC iPlayer requests (note: not
available for all series, and only for series that aired on the BBC).
parameters.viewers_28day:
number of viewers in millions within a 28-day window
from airdate.
parameters.episode: a factor denoting episode number within a series.
parameters.network_rank:
an integer denoting the episode's weekly ranking within
network (note that the networks changed for series 8 and later).
parameters.channels_rank:
an integer denoting the episode's weekly ranking
across all channels.
parameters.viewers_7day:
number of viewers in millions within a 7-day window
from airdate.
parameters.uk_airdate: a date denoting original airdate of episode in the UK.

format:
A data frame with 94 rows representing individual episodes and 9
variables:
